item.title: #en @ 1470906269972189184
item.description: @tylerblack32 @Adnama44297406 @StoneColdPillar @CDCgov @TheAtlantic @edyong209 @washingtonpost @nytimes @NYTHealth @latimes @latimeshealth @CDCDirector @lapublichealth This is wildly inaccurate. WONDER is the querying system for the VAERS data. They are one and the same. It's like using Excel to open data. It's not magically different data because i used Excel instead of Access or SQL

item.title: #en @ 1470761226657574920
item.description:
What is a Data Note?
Data Notes are an article type offered on ORE which allows researchers to describe their scientific dataset, ensuring they get both recognition and credit for their data.
Learn more: https://t.co/wbBo90Hy0q
#DataNote #OpenData #OpenScience https://t.co/ll27Z6wlG5
